General.Name: Zhejiang Walrus New Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Walrus New Material Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of PVC flooring products in China and internationally. It offers LVT, WPC, and SPC flooring products that are used in shopping malls, hotels, office buildings, hospitals, schools, stadiums, public buildings, and residences. The company was founded in 2013 and is based in Haining, China.

1.Name: Ms. Yaqin  Wang
1.Title: Deputy GM, CFO, Company Sec. & Director
